name: NIH Office of Research on Women's Health
objective: ORWH will identify projects on women's health that should be conducted or supported by national research institutes; identify multi-disciplinary research related to research on women 's health that should be conducted or supported; and promote coordination and collaboration among entities conducting research.
top_agency_name: Department of Health and Human Services
applicant_types: Private nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
Public nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
State (includes District of Columbia, public institutions of higher education and hospitals)
U.S. Territories and possessions (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)

authorizations.text: NIH Revitalization Act of 1993. 22. Pub. L. 107, 103-43.  U.S.C. § 289 (A)(1).
